name: Bubble Shooter – Magic Animal
description:
A very classic and fun bubble shooting game. Three or more identical candies can be eliminated by connecting them. The game style is very cute and is the best choice for leisure and entertainment!
Players need to use magic to help small animals eliminate specified bubbles or collections according to the mission goals. Eliminate enough bubbles to get anger bubbles. Proper use of prop bubbles can help you pass the level more easily. Let us try it now!
